commit.message:
Merge pull request #1038 from enyojs/ENYO-1025-graynorton

ENYO-1025: Fix index issue in Collection.add() with purge: true

Reviewed-By: Cole Davis (cole.davis@lge.com)
Integrated-By: Aaron Tam (aaron.tam@lge.com)

Replacing obsolete changelog with something more useful.
Enyo-DCO-1.1-Signed-Off-By: Jim Tang (jim.tang@lge.com)

ENYO-1025: Fix index issue in Collection.add() with purge: true

The logic in VerticalDelegate to avoid unnecessary refreshes on
modelsAdded was being tripped up by an issue with Collection.add
in the case where the 'purge' option was set to true.

Specifically, the insertion index reported by Collection.add was
not properly adjusted in the case where models had been purged.

Enyo-DCO-1.1-Signed-Off-By: Gray Norton (gray.norton@lge.com)

Merge pull request #1030 from enyojs/ENYO-804-blakestephens

ENYO-804: Added an alternate JavaScript timing mechanism for animation on low-powered hardware.

Reviewed-By: Krishna Rangarajan (krishna.rangarajan@lge.com)
Integrated-By: Aaron Tam (aaron.tam@lge.com)

Added support for iterationCount values like "infinite".
Cleaned the sample and added some more description text.

Enyo-DCO-1.1-Signed-off-by: Blake Stephens <blake.stephens@lge.com>

ENYO-804: Add iteration end event 'onSpriteAnimationEnds' for SpriteAnimation

- Make iteration works for both css and non css case
- Add iteration end event 'onSpriteAnimationEnds'
- Change condition for animation end from 'number' to null to support binding also

DCO-1.1-Signed-Off-By: Kunmyon Choi kunmyon.choi@lge.com

Merge pull request #1034 from enyojs/ENYO-923-master

Enyo 923 master

From: https://jira2.lgsvl.com/browse/ENYO-923

Reviewed-By: Cole Davis (cole.davis@lge.com) 
Integrated-By: Cole Davis (cole.davis@lge.com)

ENYO-923: Stop marquee when window throw blur event

Add 'focus' and 'blur' into windowEvents for ENYO-293 and ENYO-924 issue.

- Remove platform conditional statement

DCO-1.1-Signed-Off-By: Kunmyon Choi kunmyon.choi@lge.com

ENYO-923: Stop marquee when window throw blur event

Assign array after concatenate.

DCO-1.1-Signed-Off-By: Kunmyon Choi kunmyon.choi@lge.com

ENYO-923: Listen focus, blur window events only when webos version > 4

Add conditional events listening.

DCO-1.1-Signed-Off-By: Kunmyon Choi kunmyon.choi@lge.com

ENYO-923: Stop marquee when window throw blur event

Add 'focus' indo windowEvents for ENYO-924 issue

DCO-1.1-Signed-Off-By: Kunmyon Choi kunmyon.choi@lge.com

ENYO-923: Stop marquee when window throw blur event

Issue:
On app change state between BG and FG, div which is under cursor is not getting onleave event.
While marquee is flow on hover, it is not stop because it is not getting onleave event when app  goes to BG.

Fix:
- Add blur on windowEvents array to handle on dispatcher feature. (Core)
- Remember last hovered marqueeSupport control on global variable. (Marquee)
- Call onleave event handler of last hovered marqueeSupport control when app is getting onblur event. (Marquee)

DCO-1.1-Signed-Off-By: Kunmyon Choi kunmyon.choi@lge.com
Update version string to 2.6.0-pre.1.dev

Merge pull request #1029 from enyojs/ENYO-958-blakestephens

ENYO-958: Added screen aspect ratio support and detection.

Reviewed-By: Krishna Rangarajan (krishna.rangarajan@lge.com)
Integrated-By: Aaron Tam (aaron.tam@lge.com)

Performance improvement through better caching and lookups.

Enyo-DCO-1.1-Signed-off-by: Blake Stephens <blake.stephens@lge.com>

Added screen aspect ratio support and detection.
Body classes are now applied, helper functions added and documentation updated.

Enyo-DCO-1.1-Signed-off-by: Blake Stephens <blake.stephens@lge.com>

Merge pull request #1025 from enyojs/ENYO-871-blakestephens

ENYO-871: Imported resolution independence code from moonstone and added...

Reviewed-By: Krishna Rangarajan (krishna.rangarajan@lge.com)
Integrated-By: Aaron Tam (aaron.tam@lge.com)

Scope bug correction.

Enyo-DCO-1.1-Signed-off-by: Blake Stephens <blake.stephens@lge.com>

Corrected a mistaken caching assignment in the wrong function. Also, only cache the value if it makes sense to.

Enyo-DCO-1.1-Signed-off-by: Blake Stephens <blake.stephens@lge.com>

Finalized the no-CSS SpriteAnimation technique and fleshed out its features.
Added additional examples to the sample to illustrate the new code.

ENYO-804: Added a JavaScript timing alternate mechanism for animation on low-powered hardware.

Enyo-DCO-1.1-Signed-off-by: Blake Stephens <blake.stephens@lge.com>

Added multi-resolution support to enyo.Image (from Moonstone).
Improved logic so the originally defined src hash isn't lost on initial execution, replaced by the appropriate string. This allows the image potential to be reassigned later if the screen changes.
Removed some crufty get/set code and made enyo.Image.src a normal published property.

Enyo-DCO-1.1-Signed-off-by: Blake Stephens <blake.stephens@lge.com>

ENYO-952 (master)

Reviewed-By: Sungbae Cho (sb.cho@lge.com)
Integrated-By: Aaron Tam (aaron.tam@lge.com)

ENYO-952: Add resolution-independent version of less.js

Enyo-DCO-1.1-Signed-off-by: Aaron Tam <aaron.tam@lge.com>
Update version string to 2.6.0-pre.1

ENYO-871: Imported resolution independence code from moonstone and added some initialization and externalization features so any visual library can establish various screen resolutions their interface is targeting.
Added enyo.ri.defineScreenTypes.
Privatized the screenTypes array, and standardized the internal var names.

Enyo-DCO-1.1-Signed-off-by: Blake Stephens <blake.stephens@lge.com>
